name: Alone Mirror Bot
description: Telegram Mirror bot which can mirror your files to GDrive app.json by Alone

BOT_TOKEN.description: The telegram bot token that you get from @BotFather

GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID.description: This is the folder ID of the Google Drive Folder to which you want to upload all the mirrors.

DOWNLOAD_DIR.description: The path to the local folder where the downloads should be downloaded to

DOWNLOAD_STATUS_UPDATE_INTERVAL.description: A short interval of time in seconds after which the Mirror progress message is updated. (I recommend to keep it 5 seconds at least)

OWNER_ID.description: The Telegram user ID (not username) of the owner of the bot

AUTO_DELETE_MESSAGE_DURATION.description: Interval of time (in seconds), after which the bot deletes it's message (and command message) which is expected to be viewed instantly. Note: Set to -1 to never automatically delete messages

IS_TEAM_DRIVE.description: (Optional field) Set to True if GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID is from a Team Drive else False or Leave it empty.

USE_SERVICE_ACCOUNTS.description: (Optional field) (Leave empty if unsure) Whether to use service accounts or not. For this to work see on official repository ReadMe.

INDEX_URL.description: (Optional field) Refer to https://github.com/maple3142/GDIndex/ The URL should not have any slash at the end

USER_SESSION_STRING.description: Session string generated by running: python3 generate_string_session.py

MEGA_API_KEY.description: Mega.nz api key to mirror mega.nz links. Get it from Mega SDK Page: https://mega.nz/sdk

MEGA_EMAIL_ID.description: Your email id you used to sign up on mega.nz for using premium accounts (Leave th)

MEGA_PASSWORD.description: Your password for your mega.nz account
